name: Manastorm Golem
description: The Manastorm Golem is a medium-sized construct notable for its humanoid-shaped cloud form and ability to deliver powerful force damage with its attacks.
memorable: Its ability to stun opponents and communicate telepathically with its creator makes it a unique combatant.
goals: Typically aimed at combat scenarios, protecting its creator, or executing specific magical commands.
relations: Often serves a wizard or a powerful mage who created it.
environment: Usually found in magical laboratories, arcane towers, or places of power.
strengths: Immunities to numerous damage types and conditions, and advantage on saving throws against magic.
weaknesses: Low physical strength limits its melee combat effectiveness and interactions.
attacks: Features powerful slam attacks that can stun and a ranged Force Bolt that deals substantial damage.
most_powerful_ability: The Multiattack ability can immobilize a foe by stunning them if both attacks hit.
senses: Possesses truesight extending to 120 feet, allowing it to see through illusions and magical concealments.
additional_information: Can move through spaces as narrow as 1 inch due to its Amorphous trait.
Communication with its creator is magical and can pass through solid objects unless obstructed by certain materials.
Returns to its original form after any alteration lasts only one round.
test_queries: powerful magical golem that can fly
construct with truesight and magic resistance
formidable opponent with devastating force damage
